findings.title: The GalleonPool.constructor() Mints 10x More Tokens
findings.description: The instruction on L111: `_mint(msg.sender, msg.value*10);` inside the `GalleonPool.constructor()` mints 10 times more Galleon Pool Tokens (GLNPL) than the amount of ETH it is receiving.

findings.title: The Galleon DEX Owner May Arbitrarily Mint LP Tokens
findings.description: The owner of the exchange pools may arbitrarily mint LP tokens, which could lead to end-users holding LP tokens being short-handed.
